channel.title: Can't load my save files ugh...
channel.description:
I've been bashing my head for a day already, and I can't quite find the solution to this annoying problem. I've started the game like 5 times already (there is no actual place where the lag happens - it just happens) and when the game eventually hangs I have to kill the process in the task manager. But when I try to start the game again with my save files that have been created the just hangs again and the process sometimes is unkillable. This is so frustrating as I'm trying to make a ''lets play'' and the game just crashes and won't load...
the specs are as follows: Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 2.4 @ 3.2 (356x9) 1.325v Motherboard: Gigabyte EP45C-DS3R Video Card: Sapphire HD 5870 1GB GDDR5 RAM: 2x2GB DDR2 667 MHZ PC5300 + 2x1 GB 800 MHz (Total 6GB) Power Supply: Corsair TX650 Operating system: Se7en SP1 x64 Monitor: Samsung SyncMaster T200 20" HDD: 750 GB Hitachi SATA2

item.title: Can't load my save files ugh...
item.dc:creator: puddleduck14
item.description:
I have a similar problem, somewhat…

I can load BMS and it will run fine. I played for a bit the other night and made it up to the Office Complex. But, I quit the game and came back to play the next day and now BMS won’t load any of my saved games. I tried to just start a new game and hit “F9” (I think that’s quickload) but BMS just froze at that point.

Any help would be awesome!

Read full topic
item.source: Can't load my save files ugh...

item.title: Can't load my save files ugh...
item.dc:creator: gdallsk
item.description:
I’ve been bashing my head for a day already, and I can’t quite find the solution to this annoying problem. I’ve started the game like 5 times already (there is no actual place where the lag happens - it just happens) and when the game eventually hangs I have to kill the process in the task manager. But when I try to start the game again with my save files that have been created the just hangs again and the process sometimes is unkillable. This is so frustrating as I’m trying to make a ‘‘lets play’’ and the game just crashes and won’t load…

the specs are as follows:
Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 2.4 @ 3.2 (356x9) 1.325v
Motherboard: Gigabyte EP45C-DS3R
Video Card: Sapphire HD 5870 1GB GDDR5
RAM: 2x2GB DDR2 667 MHZ PC5300 + 2x1 GB 800 MHz (Total 6GB)
Power Supply: Corsair TX650
Operating system: Se7en SP1 x64
Monitor: Samsung SyncMaster T200 20"
HDD: 750 GB Hitachi SATA2
